CustomField.description: This field is being used by Netsuite and code for contracts. Before it is changed Business Systems needs to be notified, as it has a number of dependencies.
CustomField.formula:
IF(
CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Small Fleets"), "Small Business", IF( CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "AE1"), "AE1", IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Partner"), CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "AE2") ), "AE2", IF( CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "AE3"), "AE3", IF( OR( CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "ENT"), CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Enterprise"), CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Major"), CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, "Field") ), "Enterprise", "Management" ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Segment (by Current Owner)
